	DISTRIBUTOR_ADDRESS VARCHAR(255),
	DISTRIBUTOR_TELEPHONE VARCHAR(255),
	DISTRIBUTOR_CONTACT VARCHAR(255),
	DISTRIBUTOR_SALES_AREA VARCHAR(20),
	CRT_DTTM TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9),
	UPDT_DTTM TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9),
    FILE_NAME VARCHAR(255));
